title: EU law targets Big Tech over hate speech, disinformation - NPR
content:
1. EU law targets Big Tech over hate speech, disinformation  NPR
  2. Europe agrees to sweeping new regulations for tech platforms  CNN
  3. As Europe Approves New Tech Laws, the U.S. Falls Further Behind  The New York Times
  4. New E.U. landmark law targets Big Tech firms over hate speech, disinformation  NBC News
  5. EU agrees on landmark law aimed at forcing Big Tech firms to tackle illegal content  CNBC
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: The Digital Services Act, one half of an overhaul for the European Union's digital rulebook, helps cement Europe's reputation as the global leader in efforts to rein in the power of digital platforms.
